cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on April 5, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7338, Russia Cryptocurrency Transparency Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 57 (Thursday, March 31, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MEEKS:
H.R. 7338.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the Constitution
[Page H4074]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: To require congressional notification prior to payments of Department of State rewards using cryptocurrencies, and for other purposes.
